sentence.idiomatic: They are celebrating the 10 year anniversary of the company’s founding.
Everyone is celebrating her birthday.
The celebration activities will be held at 7 pm.
There are some people demonstrating on the street.
They haven’t decided the time of the parade.
Did you attend yesterday’s demonstration?
There are some things you have to fight for.
I will strive to arrive before 6:00.
You have to strive to break this record.
Everyone is equal before the law.
They received unequal treatment.
There are still some inequalities in our society.
Some employees are not satisfied with the company’s remuneration.
He feels that he received unequal treatment.
What kind of pay do you wish to receive?
As time pass by, we became accustomed.
In the course of time, everyone forgot this matter.
As time passed, no one came here.
I hope that next time similar situations will not occur.
Similar things have already happened more than once.
I have already been hearing similar things a lot. You don’t have to say it.
A happy dinner party ended with everyone’s laughter.
They all went out to dinner.
That is a good place to have dinner.
The winner will receive a one million dollar money award.
She didn’t get a bonus this time.
He did the best, so the bonus he got was the highest.
She found a good job right after she graduated, everybody envies her.
Don’t envy others. As long as you try hard, you will also succeed.
I really envy you for finding such a great boyfriend.
It’s not the weekend today, how come you’re off?
Today is International Women's Day. Are you saying that they don’t celebrate it overseas?
I have never heard of that holiday. Why is March 8th the International Women’s Day?

It’s to commemorate March 8th, over 100 years ago, when female workers marched in their quest for equal treatment in the workforce. Over time, many women of countries all around the world would hold similar activities on this day. In 1949, as soon as China’s new government was established, it declared March 8th to be Women’s Day. All women in the country get a half-day holiday. On this day there are also all kinds of celebrations and commemorative activities.
So, what activities does your company have?
They hold a dinner, and give out bonuses.
You’re so lucky! I really envy you.
